text: Stefan Brook Crichton (born February 29, 1992) is an American professional baseball pitcher for the Arizona Diamondbacks of Major League Baseball (MLB). He previously played for the Baltimore Orioles. ==Career== Crichton attended Cinco Ranch High School in Katy, Texas and played college baseball at Texas Christian University (TCU). ===Baltimore Orioles=== He was drafted by the Baltimore Orioles in the 23rd round of the 2013 Major League Baseball draft.Six TCU players taken in MLB draft, all likely to go pro Crichton was called up to the majors for the first time on April 13, 2017.Crichton also joining Orioles in Toronto (Drake DFA) He was sent back down after the game, but recalled on April 16. He made his Major League debut the same day, where he pitched 1 innings, allowing two runs and striking out two batters. Crichton was designated for assignment on March 29, 2018. ===Arizona Diamondbacks=== On April 2, 2018, the Orioles traded Crichton to the Arizona Diamondbacks for a player to be named later or cash. Crichton was released on June 23, 2018. Crichton was re-signed on a minor-league deal on June 27. He opened the 2019 season back with the Reno Aces. For the season with Arizona, he was 1-0 in 28 games. He struck out 33 batters in innings. ==References== ==External links== *TCU Horned Frogs bio Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Houston Category:Baseball players from Texas Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:Baltimore Orioles players Category:Arizona Diamondbacks players Category:TCU Horned Frogs baseball players Category:Gulf Coast Orioles players Category:Aberdeen IronBirds players Category:Delmarva Shorebirds players Category:Frederick Keys players Category:Bowie Baysox players Category:Peoria Javelinas players Category:Norfolk Tides players Category:Reno Aces players
title: Stefan Crichton
